Bleed.Description: Lose 10% of your Hp per turn and reduces healing by 50%, cures after 3 turns

Burn.Description: Lose 15% of your Hp per turn, cures after 3 turns

Poison.Description: Lose 10% of your max Hp per turn, cures after 5 turns

Freeze.Description: Lose your turn and lose 5% of your max Hp
